resources:
Hedera Wallet
Like a password, this backup phrase is the only way to recover a Hedera Wallet. Save the backup phrases to recover your Hedera Wallet if it is deleted, lost, or you get a new phone. It is recommended to also save your accountID along with these 24 words. Enter, in order, the 22 or 24 words you were given when you created your previous wallet account. You will be prompted to enter the account id in next step. If you already know the account number enter here or visit hedera portal to get it. You can skip this step and change it later in Accounts menu. Your old backup-phrase is being replaced with a new 24-word equivalent. Tap here to see that phrase - Make sure you keep a record. Your 22 words passphrase is deprecated and will not be supported in future wallet. Please save this new backup phrases to recover your Hedera Wallet
// Bip32 Migration These are your new recovery words. Please save them in a safe place (or places), where they won’t be lost, and no one else will see them. Anyone who has these words will have control of the account. A new key generation mechanism is now available. Please update your key pair and your recovery words. After securely saving your new recovery words, enter your account number here, then press \“confirm\”. Your account is now being updated. This may take a minute. Please do not quit this app or turn off the phone while it is updating. It looks like something went wrong with the key update. I’m checking now whether the account currently has the new key or the old key. SUCCESS! The key for account %1$s has been updated. The old key on that account is no longer needed.\n\nThis account can now be recovered only with the new recovery words. The old recovery words will no longer work for this account. If you didn’t create any other accounts with the old words, then you can discard the old words, after confirming that the new words work, and there are no other accounts that use them. This will update your key pair and your recovery words.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Address copied to clipboard" Address copied to clipboard" Your account info is copied successfully" Backup phrase copied to clipboard" Nodes copied to clipboard"
Cancel OK Yes No Decline Agree
Confirm fingerprint to continue Touch sensor Fingerprint not recognized. Try again Fingerprint recognized A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required. Use fingerprint in the future Use fingerprint to authenticate use_fingerprint_to_authenticate_key Fingerprint icon PLEASE CONFIRM THAT THE PROVIDED NAME MATCHES ACCOUNT ADDRESS
Default Account 0.000 H "\u210f" Ending in...%1$s Last updated %1$s Last updated 10/10/2019
Ending in...4a19a7 REQUESTS ACCOUNTS SETTINGS Welcome Enter your PIN Invalid PIN, please try again Get Started on Hedera Account unverified 0.0.9 Signature Algorithms ED25519 EC384 Dismiss TextView 35.170.13.208:50211 OR NOTES 2 minute ago CHANGE ACCOUNT NAME PUBLIC KEY PRIVATE KEY HIDE DISPLAY Hedera Wallet Version 1.0 Build 1 ACCOUNT ID $ No Transactions FROM TO AMOUNT INITIAL AMOUNT FEE NOTE PROFILE Name NOTIFICATIONS VERIFY Default Fee ( Tiny Bar)

ExportKeyActivity Please connect to WIFI and try again Invalid QR-Code Failed to scan QR-Code TODO Coming soon name (optional) e.g. 0.0.12
PIN Place a QRcode inside the rectangle Warning Fetching records will cost you hbars. Do you want to proceed? You will be sending your transaction to a third party to submit on your behalf. Make sure to only use information provided by a trusted destination.
Exporting private keys allows full control of your Hedera account even taking all the hbars in it. Ensure you are only interacting with trusted partners and software.
